reviewText: This was a Christmas gift. I watched it with the recipient, who has a medical background, and found it to be very elementary. None of the more well-known areas were mentioned, such as Vitamin C megadoses and homeopathic medicine (admittedly a European and not American focus). I thought that this DVD would be good because I like the History Channel, but appears to be just an hour of interviews with a couple of interesting tidbits of trivia best directed to a high school level of understanding. It was inexpensive but still not worth the money.
